itemDescription: British opinion journalist, writer and poet (1890-1976)

wikipedia_page.main: Fr. Jazep Hermanovich MIC (also Yazep Germanovich, Belarusian Latin alphabet: Jazep Hermanovič; Belarusian: Язэп Гэрмановіч (sometimes also spelled Германовіч), Polish: Józef Hermanowicz, 4 March 1890 - 26 December 1978) was a Belarusian Eastern Catholic priest, poet and Gulag survivor.
